name: PSYCHOLOGICAL CLINICAL SCIENCE ACCREDITATION SYSTEM
sampleDescriptions: Efforts to update regulations to permit graduates of PCSAS accredited clinical psychology programs to be eligible for federal employment, fellowships, and training programs.
